title: Enhance OM: static Update should support dynamic Update's feature of not having any attributes
body:
Dynamic (execution time) items support the following (item element with no attributes behave like an update for all the items of that type):

``` xml
<Target Name="Build">
   <ItemGroup>
      <Compile>
         <metadata>value</metadata>
      </Compile>
   </ItemGroup>
</Target>
```

This updates the metadata of all Compile items (identical to `<Compile Update="@(Compile)">`).

Static (eval time) update operations should support this too.
